title: Lux Buff Patch 7.7

replies.body:
Personally, I just don't think they are buffing her in the correct manner.  Her ultimate is pretty much always up late-game anyways.

If they want to buff her, I'd prefer one (or more) of the following options:

* +5 MS (which would restore it to her previous value)
* Casting W doesn't interrupt movement (improved chasing/escaping)
* Slight increase to her passive's damage in early levels (improved last-hitting, pushing, trading)
* Adjust the speed of her W (i.e. increasing speed the further it travels)
